stdout:
Table	Create Table
chat_sessions	CREATE TABLE `chat_sessions` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `sessionType` enum('project','asset','company') NOT NULL,
  `contextId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `companyId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `lastMessageAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `idx_user_session` (`userId`,`sessionType`),
  KEY `idx_context` (`sessionType`,`contextId`),
  KEY `idx_company` (`companyId`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=90001
